long_description: From boxes to rails to cliffs in the backcountry, the Line Dart ski poles get the job done right with a mountain-bike style grip and a freestyle-friendly design. The Line Dart ski poles feature durable aluminium poles that feel light in the hands. Thin, sticky grips won't slip as you charge the terrain park. Tabs on top of grips fit into your hands between your thumb and first finger and make 5-finger grabs a bit more manageable. When conditions change from packed to powder, switch out the smaller, 60mm baskets for larger, 90mm baskets by simply screwing them off the poles.
short_description: From boxes to rails to cliffs in the backcountry, the Line Dart ski poles get the job done right with a mountain-bike style grip and a freestyle-friendly design.
